title: Hour 1: Stugotz's Shell Game
description:
We analyze the shell game Stugotz is always playing, even in his marriage. Then, Russell Wilson and Kyler Murray's play at the QB position, and Dan and Mike Ryan each have a Stat of the Day. Plus, Dan chats one-on-one with Deontay Wilder about his career arc, lifelong motivations, and his upcoming fight.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
